original_text: God, you have made me very weak. You have destroyed my family. God, you have made me very weak.
korean_text: 이제 주께서 나를 피로하게 하시고 나의 온 집안을 패망하게 하셨나이다

sentences.original_text: God, you have made me very weak
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이시여, 당신은 나를 매우 약하게 만드셨습니다

sentences.original_text: God, you have made me very weak
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이시여, 당신은 나를 매우 약하게 만드셨습니다
